name: Screeny Screenerton
author: Gary Kovar

sections.description: Using the screenshotmachine.com api a column is added to the list of posts that displays a screen cap from a mobile device. By no means does this replace device testing! I use it because I often write extremely long titles and I want to make sure that my title doesn’t run more than 1 mobile screen long.
sections.installation:
1. Install from repository
  2. Register for an account at screenshotmachine.com (100 free screenshots/month).
  3. Add your api key to the Screen Menu Settings Page.
  4. Dance like no one is watching!
  5. Right click on the screenshots and open in a new window if you want to see it in all its glory.
sections.faq:
Why screenshotmachine.com?

Because it’s really easy to use.
sections.changelog:
0.1.2

  • I spelled the name of my own plugin wrong…doh!

0.1

  • This is the version I’m using on my sites.
  • Removed most (all?) self-deprecating comments.

short_description: This plugin shows an image preview of what a post would look like when viewed on mobile.  The image preview shows in a column on the posts page in wp- …
description: Using the screenshotmachine.com api a column is added to the list of posts that displays a screen cap from a mobile device. By no means does this replace device testing! I use it because I often write extremely long titles and I want to make sure that my title doesn’t run more than 1 mobile screen long.

screenshots.caption: Set your API key form screenshotmachine.com and turn on display for either desktop view, mobile view, or both.
This is how the screenshots will display in the posts view.  A simple screenshot of your choice to the right side of the columns displayed.
